import React, { Component } from 'react' import './Formation.css' import Slider from 'react-slick' import Image from 'react-bootstrap/Image' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import { MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol } from 'mdbreact' export default class PreviousNextMethods extends Component { constructor (props) { super(props) this.state = { nav1: null, nav2: null } } componentDidMount () { this.setState({ nav1: this.slider1, nav2: this.slider2 }) } render () { const settings = { dots: false, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1 } return (
